settings.subheading: A curated selection for designers who dare to define what's next.

settings.text: Provide your exclusive artwork or collaborate with our in-house studio. With advanced printing tech and a vast fabric library, we are the seamless extension of your design team.
settings.title: A Canvas for Your Creativity

settings.description: For our latest bridal collection, we needed a fabric that was truly unique. Fominte's team worked with us to create a delicate, custom tone-on-tone floral print that was simply breathtaking. The quality is perfect for couture.
settings.title: Serena ValentiÔºàBridal & Couture DesignerÔºâ

settings.description: Fominte's full OEM service is a game-changer. Managing our custom print and garment construction under one roof has saved us so much time and eliminated the complexities of working with multiple suppliers. The quality control is simply excellent.
settings.title: Marcus ThorneÔºàProduction DirectorÔºâ

settings.description: Working with Fominte felt like a true collaboration. They took my artwork, helped select the perfect base fabric, and brought my vision to life with incredible color precision. A seamless extension of my design studio.
settings.title: Alexia GrantÔºàFounder, Independent LabelÔºâ

settings.description: The print quality is consistently impressive. Their technical team understands the nuances of different fabrics and printing methods, and the color matching to our Pantone standards was perfect. A reliable and professional partner.
settings.title: Kenji TanakaÔºàFabric DeveloperÔºâ

settings.description: It's a pleasure to work with a supplier who is also design-driven. Fominte's curated print library is a fantastic starting point for inspiration, and their team is always ready to collaborate on creating something unique and trend-forward for the season.
settings.title: Olivia ChenÔºàCreative DirectorÔºâ

settings.html:
Fashion

Core Capabilities

Applications

Customization

Care Instructions

FAQ

Our Commitment

Our Core Capabilities

A stable and reliable supply chain is the cornerstone of a fashion brand. Our vertically integrated production base gives you a seamless and dependable partner.

Strong Production Capabilities>

Scale & Capacity: Our flexible production model is equipped to handle exclusive, small-batch runs for couture designers as well as larger-scale production for ready-to-wear collections.

Vertical Integration: We control the entire creation process—from base fabric sourcing and textile printing to final garment construction—ensuring superior quality control and predictable timelines.

Global Delivery & Trust>

Trusted by designers in over 120 countries, our extensive experience in international trade guarantees a smooth partnership. Our logistics team ensures every order is handled with precision to meet your production deadlines.

Technology & Innovation>

We offer a comprehensive suite of printing technologies, including high-fidelity digital, screen, and dye-sublimation, ensuring precise Pantone color matching and sharpness. Our on-site R&D team also collaborates with clients to engineer custom fabrics and bring exclusive artwork to life.

Sustainable & Ethical Practices>

Our certifications (ISO 9001, BSCI, GRS, SGS) are our pledge to product excellence, environmental stewardship, and ethical practices. We commit to ethical treatment of workers (BSCI), offer printing on certified recycled base fabrics (GRS), and maintain the highest levels of product quality (ISO, SGS).

Fabric by Application

Our fabrics provide the perfect canvas, offering beautiful drape, a luxurious hand-feel, and vibrant, high-fidelity prints that bring your creative concepts to life.

Tops & Blouses>

The Statement Blouse: Unleash your creativity with our large-scale Abstract, Floral, or Scenery prints on fluid, lightweight bases, perfect for crafting blouses with voluminous sleeves and an artistic flair.

Elevated Essentials: Utilize our sophisticated Geometric or delicate botanical prints on premium cottons and woven blends to elevate classic shirting, tunics, and shells with a layer of designer detail.

Skirts & Trousers>

Flowing Silhouettes: Create breathtaking movement with our large-scale prints on fabrics with exquisite drape, perfect for maxi skirts, palazzo pants, and culottes.

Tailored Statements: For structured pieces like pencil skirts or cigarette pants, our graphic Geometric and Abstract prints provide a modern edge on bases that support sharp, clean silhouettes.

Dresses>

The Ethereal Day Dress: Our romantic Floral, Botanical, and Scenery prints on lightweight cottons and crepes are the perfect match for creating flowing maxi dresses, elegant midis, and chic shirt dresses.

The Modern Cocktail Gown: Make a powerful evening statement with our bold Abstracts, Portraits, or Geometrics, printed on fabrics with a subtle sheen for unforgettable contemporary cocktail dresses.

Bridal & Gowns>

Unconventional Bridal: Move beyond traditional white with custom-printed fabrics. We can print delicate, tone-on-tone florals, subtle personal motifs, or ethereal abstracts to create a look that is deeply personal and unique.

Couture & Red Carpet: Our large-format digital printing is ideal for creating show-stopping gala gowns and red-carpet looks by perfectly replicating intricate, large-scale artwork onto luxurious fabrics.

Jumpsuits & Rompers>

The Sophisticated Jumpsuit: Craft elegant, tailored jumpsuits using our sophisticated Geometric or Abstract prints on fabrics with a beautiful drape to create a flattering, elongated silhouette.

The Playful Romper: Our vibrant Floral and cheerful prints are ideal for creating stylish and youthful rompers on lightweight, breathable base fabrics for resort and summer collections.

Customization - Fashion Fabrics

We provide a fully integrated, end-to-end customization service designed to function as a seamless extension of your design studio.

Our Customization Capabilities>

Bespoke Fabric Printing: Provide your own artwork, or collaborate with our in-house team to select or modify prints. Choose from our extensive library of base fabrics, or our sourcing team will procure it for you. We then select the ideal printing technology for the most vibrant results.

Full Garment OEM Solutions: Our turnkey service takes your vision from a tech pack to a retail-ready product. We manage pattern making, sampling, production, finishing, and the application of your custom labels, tags, and packaging.

The Customization Process>

Our efficient process includes: Consultation & Quote, Sampling (typically one week), Sample Approval, and Bulk Production.

Design Confidentiality>

Absolutely. We treat all custom projects with strict confidentiality. Your design is your intellectual property, and we will never disclose or sell your exclusive patterns to any third party.

A Guide to Caring for Your Custom Printed Fabrics

This guide provides professional best practices for most high-quality printed textiles. We will provide detailed, fabric-specific care recommendations for your final product for your own brand‚Äôs care labels.

General Cleaning Recommendations>

Professional Dry-Cleaning (Safest Option): Recommended for delicate fabrics like viscose or for garments with highly saturated, dark prints to preserve texture and vibrancy.

Gentle Machine Washing: For durable fabrics like cotton, turn the garment inside out and use a delicate cycle with cold water and a mild, phosphate-free detergent.

Drying>

Air Drying (Strongly Recommended): Lay flat or hang on a line away from direct sunlight to prevent fading.

Tumble Drying (Use with Extreme Caution): Use the lowest possible heat or a no-heat "Air Fluff" cycle. High heat can cause print fading and damage synthetic fibers.

What to Avoid>

Strictly avoid: High Heat (most critical), Bleach, Soaking for extended periods, and Aggressive Wringing.

Ironing & Steaming>

Always iron on the reverse side on a low heat setting, never allowing the hot plate to directly contact the print. Using a pressing cloth provides extra protection. A handheld steamer is often a safer alternative.

Frequently Asked Questions

What printing technologies do you specialize in?>

We offer a comprehensive suite including high-fidelity digital printing, traditional screen printing, and dye-sublimation, selecting the optimal method for your specific artwork and fabric choice.

What types of base fabrics can I print on?>

We provide a curated selection of print-ready base fabrics, including a variety of cottons, viscoses, and polyesters. We do not offer silk bases at this time, but our sourcing team can procure specific materials for you.

What is your MOQ for custom prints and OEM garments?>

MOQs vary based on project specifics like base fabric, printing method, and garment complexity. We are committed to accommodating both emerging designers and established brands; please contact our sales team for a detailed quote.

What is the difference between custom fabric and full OEM service?>

Our Custom Fabric Printing service delivers finished, printed fabric by the meter/yard for your own manufacturing. Our Full Garment OEM Service is an end-to-end solution where we manage everything from your tech pack to a finished, retail-ready garment.

Still Have Questions?>

If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, or if you wish to discuss your specific project in greater detail, please do not hesitate to reach out. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you. Contact us directly at: Stephen@fominte.com

Our Commitment

Our promise is woven into every fiber we produce. We are committed to delivering unparalleled quality, innovative design, and a partnership you can trust through measurable standards.

Commitment to Speed & Efficiency>

We understand that speed-to-market is critical for your success. Our streamlined process ensures your vision becomes a reality, fast.

Rapid Sampling: We pledge to deliver satisfactory custom samples for your approval within 7 working days.

Reliable Delivery: Once approved, we guarantee that standard bulk orders will be ready for shipment within 30 days. This predictability allows you to plan your collections with confidence.

Commitment to Responsive Service>

Clear and timely communication is the foundation of a great partnership. Our dedicated team is always accessible, ensuring your questions are answered and your project never loses momentum.

Online Inquiries: For messages received via our online chat during business hours, we commit to a response time of under 2 hours.

Email Correspondence: All email inquiries will receive a comprehensive reply within 24 hours.

Commitment to Quality & Partnership>

Beyond speed and service, our ultimate commitment is to the integrity of our product and the strength of our relationship. We stand behind every yard of fabric, ensuring it meets global standards and your highest expectations. We are more than a supplier; we are a dedicated partner in your success, committed to design confidentiality and ethical practices.

Our Manufacturing Infrastructure

settings.text: Quality lies in the details. Utilizing advanced multi-head embroidery machinery and premium threads, we achieve complex patterns with flawless consistency. From the density of the stitch to the placement of every sequin, Fominte delivers the high standard required by luxury fashion brands.
